bibl.title: Towards a Historical Topography of the Fayum.
bibl.note: Includes some preliminary remarks on what the papyrological documentation for the Polemon meris can contribute to reconstruction of its topography.

bibl.title: Archaeological Research in Roman Egypt. The Proceedings of The Seventeenth Classical Colloquium of The Department of Greek and Roman Antiquities, British Museum, held on 1-4 December, 1993

bibl.seg: RATHBONE Dominic, Towards a Historical Topography of the Fayum.

Archaeological Research in Roman Egypt. The Proceedings of The Seventeenth Classical Colloquium of The Department of Greek and Roman Antiquities, British Museum, held on 1-4 December, 1993 = JRA. Supplementary Series. 19 (Ann Arbor, Michigan, 1996) pp. 50-56, 1 carte.
Includes some preliminary remarks on what the papyrological documentation for the Polemon meris can contribute to reconstruction of its topography.
